item.media:title: Ukrainian soldier's musical respite amidst conflict
item.media:description: On March 7, 2023, in Chasiv Yar, Ukraine, a Ukrainian soldier, known as @warbeauti, captured a poignant moment on video. Amidst the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, he played a piano in an abandoned building and then stepped out into the streets. In his own words, he recounted that his unit played a crucial role in maintaining the vital road to Bakhmut, thwarting the efforts of hostile forces.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers receive heartwarming support from ordinary people: goodies and solidarity in Donetsk region
item.media:description: Ukrainian soldiers in the Donetsk region, amidst the ongoing Ukraine-Russia conflict, have received a heartwarming gesture of support from ordinary citizens. In a video captured by @kentokua on September 10, 2023, soldiers can be seen opening a box filled with goods sent by compassionate individuals. These donations came in response to a campaign initiated by Serhiy, where funds were collected for ammunition. The soldiers' genuine efforts and transparency in their fundraising efforts inspired people to contribute, illustrating that when trust is established, people respond with kindness and generosity.

item.media:title: The Ukrainian Armed Forces hit the headquarters of the Russian Black Sea Fleet with a missile
item.media:description: The Ukrainian Armed Forces launched a missile attack on the headquarters of the Black Sea Fleet in Sevastopol, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported. According to the department, one soldier is missing. A fire started in the building, the surrounding area was cordoned off by police, and roads in the city were blocked. The head of Crimea Aksenov said that several cruise missiles were shot down over the peninsula. During the attack, an American reconnaissance plane took off into the sky over the Black Sea.

item.media:title: Shattered windows: impact of Russian shelling on Ukrainian homes
item.media:description: In Cherkasy, Ukraine, the grim reality of the ongoing conflict with Russia came crashing through the windows of a local home, as captured by @studentsov.sss on September 21, 2023. In a chilling video, one window pane can be seen completely shattered, while another remains cracked, a stark testament to the violence that has engulfed the region. Glass debris litters the room, scattering across the floor and onto the sofa, serving as a somber reminder of the danger that civilians face daily. As @studentsov.sss notes, "It flew near the apartment. That's how the windows in the living room beat us."

item.media:title: iPhone 15 launch draws massive crowds in Shenzhen amid Huawei's revival
item.media:description: Shenzhen, China, September 22, 2023 - The highly anticipated release of Apple's iPhone 15 saw a massive influx of eager customers flocking to the Apple Store in Shenzhen, undeterred by the recent resurgence of Huawei in the smartphone market. In a video captured by @scriptisah, long queues of people could be seen waiting patiently in line, while others explored the latest iPhone offerings inside the store. The enduring popularity of Apple's flagship product remains evident as enthusiasts enthusiastically embraced the iPhone 15, marking yet another successful launch.

item.media:title: Storm chaser captures developing mesocyclone near McCook, Nebraska
item.media:description: On September 21, 2023, in McCook, Nebraska, USA, storm chaser @mjfuld54/ @storm_scape captured a video of a developing storm just 10 miles west of the town. The video revealed ominous low-lying dark clouds, signaling the storm's intensity. At 4:45 PM Central Daylight Time, the storm chaser reported the reemergence of an upper-level mesocyclone, indicating the storm's attempt to intensify. Further south, another massive storm was underway, with rain enveloping the back porch. The two storms appeared to be merging into a single, formidable system. @mjfuld54/@storm_scape noted the possibility of a wall cloud forming, suggesting the potential for further weather developments in the vicinity of McCook.

item.media:title: Disturbing footage: brazen dog theft caught on camera in Nam Truc District, Vietnam
item.media:description: Shocking surveillance footage captured by @duyhung.ldh on August 3, 2023, in Nam Truc District, Nam Dinh province, Vietnam, depicts a distressing incident of dog theft. In the video, two individuals on a motorbike approached a dog standing on the road and used a bait to incapacitate it. One of the culprits then snatched the dog, and they fled the scene. Dog thefts, while less common in recent years, remain a serious issue in Vietnam due to the lucrative black market for stolen dogs, where they are sold for approximately $2.80 per kilogram. This incident highlights the ongoing challenges surrounding pet theft in the region, leaving pet owners anxious and deeply concerned for their beloved companions.
item.media:city: Nam Truc District, Nam Dinh province

item.media:title: Eagle Pass, Texas issues emergency declaration due to increased migrants from Mexico
item.media:description: On September 21, 2023, in Eagle Pass, Texas, USA, @cabelloAuden captured a compelling video revealing the significant influx of migrants under the Piedras Negras-Eagle bridge, which had been closed due to the surge in migration from Mexico to the USA. Initially estimated at 1,500 individuals, Sheriff Tom Schmerber later confirmed that the total number of migrants crossing from Piedras Negras to Eagle Pass had reached 3,000. This sudden surge prompted the city of Eagle Pass to issue an emergency declaration. Mayor Rolando Salinas emphasized the city's commitment to the safety and well-being of its residents, stating that the declaration would enable them to request additional financial resources to address the needs arising from the influx of undocumented immigrants.

item.media:title: Flooded NW10 Victoria Road in London: urgent call for infrastructure action
item.media:description: On September 20, 2023, heavy rainfall wreaked havoc on NW10 Victoria Road in London, UK, as captured in a video by @yogen_uk27. The footage shows a car nearly submerged in water, with the floodwaters rising just above the vehicle's tires. The video's caption, "Please Fix the road first then talk about other matters," appears to be a direct response to UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's discussions on climate change.

item.media:title: Shocking wedding shooting in Cherkessk, North Caucasus: guest opens fire at another guest
item.media:description: In a disturbing incident that unfolded during a wedding celebration in Cherkessk, Russia, on August 15, 2023, one guest shot another in a brazen act of violence. The altercation between the two guests led to one of them being forcibly ejected from the banquet hall. However, the situation escalated when the ousted guest returned armed with a weapon he had reportedly stolen from his car. Surveillance footage captured the armed assailant approaching the victim's table, firing three shots, and swiftly retreating from the scene. Thankfully, the injured guest was quickly transported to a medical facility, and his life is no longer in jeopardy. Law enforcement authorities have since apprehended the shooter, and a criminal case for attempted murder has been initiated in response to this shocking incident.

item.media:title: Violent road rage incident erupts in Pervouralsk intersection, bystanders intervene
item.media:description: In a shocking incident on August 18, 2023, in Pervouralsk, Russia, a driver instigated a violent confrontation with a motorcyclist at the busy intersection of Lenina, 39. The altercation, captured on video, saw the driver abruptly stopping his car, confronting the motorcyclist, and assaulting him. It remains unclear what triggered the driver's aggression, but he repeatedly attacked the motorcyclist, even after the intervention of two bystanders. The disturbing scene unfolded amidst the flow of passing traffic at the intersection.

item.media:title: Man detained for unprovoked attack on schoolboy in Tomsk region
item.media:description: In a shocking incident that occurred on September 4, 2023, near school No. 1 in the village of Bely Yar, Verkhneketsky district of the Tomsk region, Russia, a man has been apprehended by local authorities for assaulting a schoolboy without apparent cause. The disturbing episode unfolded when the young student was among his peers, standing near the school's entrance, innocently reaching into his backpack. Suddenly, an unidentified individual charged onto the school grounds and struck the child forcefully on the head with an open palm, causing the boy to tumble onto the unforgiving asphalt below. Although the motive behind the adult's aggressive act remains unclear, law enforcement promptly detained the assailant, identified as a 1978-born local resident.

item.media:title: Heroic rescue: man saves dog amid Ukraine-Russia conflict
item.media:description: In a harrowing video captured by @ludenskyi on September 18, 2023, in Orikhiv, Ukraine, a man was seen heroically rescuing a dog from the midst of the Ukraine-Russia conflict. The man, whose home had been personally struck by enemy shells, risked his life to evacuate the frightened dog from the war-torn area. Holding the dog by its collar, he explained the dire situation, stating that the area was subjected to daily attacks. The rescued dog is now undergoing rehabilitation in Dnipro before finding its way to a shelter in Khmelnytskyi, where efforts will be made to secure a new loving family for the fortunate canine.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers engage Russian forces with mortars in Kherson region
item.media:description: In a recent video captured by @alx.vlm88 on July 9, 2023, in the Kherson region of Ukraine, Ukrainian soldiers were seen utilizing a mortar from their trenches in a confrontation with Russian forces. The footage shows the soldiers firing multiple rounds at the enemy before swiftly concealing their mortar and relocating.

item.media:title: Wildfires ravage Santa Elena, Argentina: video captures the blazing inferno
item.media:description: On September 17, 2023, in Santa Elena, Córdoba, Argentina, @cristian.j.carrion captured a chilling video showcasing the rampant wildfires plaguing the region. The footage vividly portrays the devastating scene with flames and thick plumes of smoke billowing in the distance, fueled by burning plant material. The wildfires continue to pose a significant threat to the area, demanding urgent attention and resources to contain their destructive spread.

item.media:title: Aerial view: firefighter's perspective on wildfires in Córdoba, Argentina
item.media:description: In a gripping video captured on September 15, 2023, by firefighter @cristian.j.carrion, the raging wildfires in Córdoba, Argentina, come into sharp focus from an aerial perspective. This harrowing footage provides a unique view of the inferno as seen from the skies above. Thick plumes of smoke billow up from below, shrouding the landscape, while the relentless fires burn with an eerie intensity. The author, a dedicated firefighter, offers a stark glimpse into the challenging battles faced by the brave men and women on the front lines of this environmental crisis.

item.media:title: Viral video reveals mysterious dilapidated hospital section in Buenos Aires
item.media:description: A video captured by @carliigonzalez__ on September 13, 2023, in Buenos Aires, Argentina, has taken social media by storm. The footage showcases what appears to be an abandoned and deteriorating section of a local hospital, even though it remains unknown to many, including hospital staff. The video has quickly gone viral, sparking curiosity and questions about the forgotten area within the medical facility.

item.media:title: Law enforcement officer dismissed for rough handling of woman and child in Fergana, Uzbekistan
item.media:description: In a disturbing incident captured on video and circulated on social networks, a law enforcement officer in Fergana, Uzbekistan, was seen forcibly pushing a woman with a small child into an official vehicle. The incident took place on September 18, 2023, when the woman was allegedly begging for alms at a road intersection and obstructing traffic. According to the Ministry of Internal Affairs, when officers attempted to identify her and bring her to the department for administrative charges, the woman resisted and even threw her small child to the ground while attempting to escape. Despite the absence of a formal complaint from the woman, an internal audit was initiated, leading to the officer's dismissal. Measures are also being taken to prevent the exploitation of infants and minors in begging activities at various locations, including roadways and markets.

item.media:title: Environmental crisis: toxic algae bloom devastates UK's largest freshwater lake
item.media:description: On September 4, 2023, @DENISEJOHNSTO10 captured a video at Ballyronan Marina on Lough Neagh in Northern Ireland, UK, revealing a troubling environmental disaster. The footage depicted the lake's surface completely covered in a thick layer of blue-green algae and decaying organic matter. Lough Neagh, the United Kingdom's largest freshwater lake, is now grappling with a crisis as these toxic algae blooms wreak havoc on its aquatic ecosystem. These algae are not just unsightly; they also contain harmful toxins, posing a grave threat to the lake's delicate balance and the myriad species that call it home.

item.media:title: Severe flooding ravages streets of Molina de Segura, Spain after record rainstorm
item.media:description: Severe flooding wreaked havoc in Molina de Segura, Spain, on September 12, 2023, as the streets were transformed into rushing rivers. Eloy Lacal captured video footage of the floodwaters carrying debris such as trash cans, a chair, and a table downstream. To protect their properties, residents of affected buildings barricaded their gates to prevent the floodwaters from inundating their premises. This unprecedented flooding event was the result of a heavy rainstorm that pounded the region, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

item.media:title: Azerbaijan launches military action in Nagorno-Karabakh, escalating regional tensions
item.media:description: On September 19, 2023, Azerbaijan initiated military action in the Nagorno-Karabakh region, a move that has raised concerns of a potential resurgence of conflict in this historically volatile area. Azerbaijan claims this operation is essential to restore constitutional order and remove Armenian military presence from the region. Nagorno-Karabakh, internationally recognized as Azerbaijani territory but currently administered by breakaway ethnic Armenian authorities, remains a longstanding flashpoint.

item.media:title: Knife-wielding man terrifies Almaty bus passengers after altercation: police investigation underway
item.media:description: On August 30, 2023, in Almaty, Kazakhstan, a harrowing incident unfolded on bus No. 135, when a man engaged in a dispute with another passenger escalated the situation by brandishing a knife, causing widespread fear among fellow travelers. Passengers on the bus urgently called for the driver to open the doors, and at the next stop, the armed individual disembarked. Almaty's police department swiftly responded to the incident, with the Auezov district police department launching an investigation. Authorities have identified the individual involved, noting that he is registered at the Mental Health Center. Legal actions in accordance with the Republic of Kazakhstan's legislation are being pursued to address his actions. A video capturing the tense moment showed the man near the bus door, knife in hand, as he threatened fellow passengers.

item.media:title: Teenage football game turns violent: man punches boy in Rudny, Kazakhstan
item.media:description: In Rudny, Kazakhstan, on September 10, 2023, a group of teenagers playing football in a residential courtyard at Lenin Street, 177, encountered a disturbing incident when a drunken man invaded their game. The adolescents attempted to leave the premises, but the inebriated intruder managed to catch up with one of the boys, brutally striking him in the jaw with both a fist and a knee. Surveillance cameras captured the assault, leading to swift police intervention. The injured boy is currently receiving medical care, with his condition not deemed life-threatening. Law enforcement authorities have apprehended the assailant, who is now undergoing medical detoxification and faces potential imprisonment for up to two years due to his actions.

item.media:title: Russian forces shell residential building in Chasiv Yar, Ukraine
item.media:description: In Chasiv Yar, Ukraine, on September 15, 2023, a video captured by volunteer Evgeny Tkachev depicted a residential building engulfed in flames due to shelling by Russian forces. The footage revealed several rooms ablaze in the midst of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia. While not the entire structure was consumed by fire, a significant portion of the building had succumbed to the devastating effects of the attack.

item.media:title: Risky ledge stroll: Astana teens defy heights on 13th floor
item.media:description: On August 27, 2023, in Astana, Kazakhstan, a shocking incident unfolded as two daring teenagers were caught on camera nonchalantly strolling along the precarious ledge of a 13th-floor balcony. An Astana resident captured the reckless act on video, revealing the youngsters defying gravity with seemingly little regard for their safety. In the footage, the teenagers can be seen perched on the ledge, their legs casually dangling over the edge, as they tempt fate at a perilous height.

item.media:title: Flooding crisis at Ayuso Hospital due to Begoña Metro pipe break
item.media:description: On September 14, 2023, a critical situation unfolded at Ayuso Hospital in La Paz, Madrid, Spain. Meylin0226 captured a startling video, wading through water within the hospital's premises, highlighting the dire consequences of a pipe break at the nearby Begoña metro station. The incident was directly linked to ongoing construction work by Metro de Madrid at the Begoña station, leading to extensive flooding within the medical facility. Meylin0226 humorously captioned the video, "It was almost impossible for us to go pick up our clothes from the changing rooms at the La Paz Ayuso Hospital."

item.media:title: Sochi residents are up in arms against a woman who “rented” an entire beach during rush hour
item.media:description: On September 16, 2023, in Sochi, Russia, residents of the Krasnodar Territory were left fuming as they witnessed a woman seemingly monopolizing the entire Mayak beach, basking in solitude while others were crammed together "on top of each other." Outraged beachgoers couldn't help but express their frustration at the apparent display of selfishness. However, it was soon revealed that the woman in question was not an ordinary tourist seeking isolation but an actress hard at work. She was on the beach as part of a film shoot, leaving the disgruntled crowd to realize that their anger had been misplaced.

item.media:title: Transport police officers heroically rescue man in clinical death at Nizhny Novgorod railway station
item.media:description: Transport police officers at the Moskovsky railway station in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia, sprang into action on September 12, 2023, when they rescued a man in a state of clinical death. While patrolling the station platform, they noticed a group of three men, one of whom appeared to be unconscious. Upon closer inspection, they confirmed the man's condition and promptly called paramedics. Senior police sergeant Alexey Pazukhin administered lifesaving resuscitation measures, reviving the man, who later revealed he was a father of two. In recognition of their swift and effective response, the police officers were rewarded for their heroic act.

item.media:title: Brazen smartphone thief caught hanging out of minibus window in Moscow
item.media:description: On September 14, 2023, in Moscow, Russia, a daring smartphone thief found himself in a precarious situation as he attempted to make a swift exit through the window of a minibus after snatching a passenger's device. The thief's brazen escape attempt was caught on video, showcasing a heart-pounding moment when he hung perilously out of the vehicle window, facing forward. However, his audacious getaway was met with a chorus of loud screams from fellow passengers, who wasted no time in trying to thwart his efforts. Determined to bring the thief to justice, they grabbed hold of his legs, expressing genuine concern for his safety as they grappled with the situation. The victim, not one to be outdone, promptly dialed the police, ensuring that this bold thief's escapade would not go unpunished.

item.media:title: Rescuers save five-year-old trapped in washing machine in Kazan, Russia
item.media:description: On September 11, 2023, in Kazan, Russia, a dramatic incident unfolded when an emergency call to the number 112 reported that a five-year-old boy had become trapped inside a washing machine within one of the city's apartments. Swift action was taken as rescuers promptly arrived at the scene. The video footage of the rescue operation revealed the child's lower body wedged within the machine. With remarkable skill and dedication, the rescuers successfully extricated the young boy from his perilous predicament. The child was swiftly handed over to emergency medical personnel for evaluation and care.

item.media:title: Man in military uniform detonates flash-noise grenade near children in Kazan, Russia
item.media:description: In a shocking incident in Kazan, Russia, on September 15, 2023, a man dressed in military uniform detonated a flash-noise grenade in the courtyard of a residential high-rise building. The unsettling event was captured on an intercom camera and subsequently circulated on local public pages. The footage showed the man and a young woman seated on a bench. Despite weak attempts to dissuade him, the man proceeded to throw the grenade toward a flowerbed where children, aged 8-10, were standing. An explosion ensued, leaving witnesses in shock. The man, seemingly unfazed by the blast, muttered an apology, while his companion chose to leave.

item.media:title: Ukraine war veteran's inspiring hospital workout after surviving amputation
item.media:description: In a poignant video captured on September 12, 2023, in Mukachevo, Ukraine, user @6oroga_ua shared a powerful glimpse into his life as a war veteran. Having undergone a leg amputation due to injuries sustained on the front lines during the Ukraine-Russia conflict, he demonstrated incredible resilience. The author recounted the harrowing events of May 29 when he and his comrades found themselves surrounded while changing posts. Amidst a barrage of gunfire, mortar shells, and drones, their commander tragically lost his life. @6oroga_ua's own survival hinged on quick thinking and self-application of a tourniquet after a mine explosion severely injured his leg. Despite these hardships, his determination shines through as he continues to work on his physical fitness.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers ambush Russian-occupied building
item.media:description: On March 1, 2023, in Bakhmut, Ukraine, a video captured by @kuzmych.3 showcased a dramatic moment as Ukrainian soldiers launched an assault on a building occupied by Russian forces. In the footage, a pickup truck carrying Ukrainian soldiers can be seen halting as they disembark and retrieve their weapons from the trunk of another vehicle before proceeding to set up an ambush. The video's focus remains on the Ukrainian soldiers, making it impossible to spot the Russians, but the building they were targeting is evident. Notably, one of the soldiers in the video displayed X-rays of injuries sustained during the battle.

item.media:title: La Garena station submerged: heavy rains flood Alcalá de Henares, Madrid, Spain
item.media:description: On the morning of September 15, 2023, heavy rains unleashed their fury upon Alcalá de Henares, Madrid, Spain, causing a sudden flood crisis at La Garena station. In a video captured by @Candelaleon_, the station's entrance was seen submerged in floodwaters, presenting a formidable obstacle to the commuters. The caption of the video humorously questioned the preparedness of Renfe Alcalá de Henares, playfully suggesting the need for swimsuits to navigate the deluge.

item.media:title: Surviving the battlefield: Ukrainian soldier's harrowing escape from mortar attack
item.media:description: On August 8, 2023, near the village of Robotino, Ukraine, Ukrainian soldier @evgenymosolov2 found himself in the midst of a war-stricken area, capturing a chilling video of damaged buildings and the sounds of gunfire in the background. In the video, he recounted a close encounter with danger as a mortar and two tanks fired just ten meters away, resulting in the immediate death of six people and leaving him with a concussion. Thanks to the quick actions of his commander and fellow soldiers, he was evacuated to safety. Upon returning to his unit's resting place, he discovered that the house where they had been staying was destroyed, but miraculously, his comrades were alive and well.

item.media:title: Conflict escalates: Ukrainian soldier prepares drone for strikes against Russian Forces near Bakhmut
item.media:description: In a concerning development amidst the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a video captured by @lid_skhid on January 7, 2023, in Zabakhmutka, Bakhmut, Ukraine, has revealed the use of armed drones by Ukrainian forces. The footage shows the preparation and launch of a war drone, armed with what appears to be a mini missile. This drone later that day, flew approximately 800 meters from a local fire station to a trench where nine Russian individuals were situated. Shockingly, the drone dropped a total of 20 explosive payloads in a single day.

item.media:title: Near miss: pedestrian narrowly escapes truck collision in Krasnoyarsk, Russia
item.media:description: In a heart-stopping incident near Krasnoyarsk, Russia, on September 11, 2023, a pedestrian narrowly escaped a catastrophic collision with a multi-ton truck. The harrowing moment was captured on video as the truck careened off the road, hurtling towards the pedestrian at high speed. Miraculously, the pedestrian managed to evade the oncoming disaster just in the nick of time. The truck, however, plowed through a fence and tumbled into a ditch, severing a power line and overturning in the process. The video footage shows the truck's cab detaching from the rest of the vehicle as it veered off the road. The fate of the truck's driver remains uncertain.

item.media:title: Clumsy Maykop jewelry store robber nearly loses weapon during heist
item.media:description: In a daring morning heist on September 13, 2023, in Maykop, Russia, a masked assailant entered the "Gold of Russia" jewelry store, brandishing what appeared to be a firearm. The robber, who initially entered with his face concealed, demanded that the female employees hand over four trays of gold chains. Amid the chaos, one brave employee attempted to seize the weapon from the criminal, but her efforts were in vain. The thief managed to escape the scene before police could apprehend him, prompting an immediate Siren plan response. е captured the tense moments as the robber entered the store, pointed the weapon-like object at the store attendants, and later donned gloves, leaving authorities on the hunt for the clumsy yet elusive criminal.

item.media:title: Chaos erupts on Yelcho Street: dramatic shootout during 50th anniversary of coup commemoration in Santiago, Chile
item.media:description: On September 12, 2023, Yelcho Street in Santiago, Chile, became the backdrop for a violent confrontation as protesters marked the 50th anniversary of the coup that rocked the nation's history. In a video captured by @breaktitus, a tense situation escalated into a shootout, accompanied by the roar of a police armored vehicle. Gunshots rang out amidst the chaos, with fires blazing on the street, underscoring the intensity of the clashes that marred this poignant commemoration.

item.media:title: Torrential rain turns Maastricht streets into rivers: cars wading through tire-high floodwaters
item.media:description: On September 12, 2023, heavy rainfall in Maastricht, Netherlands led to severe flooding in the area. A video captured by @Mart_Teunissen near a window shows the streets submerged in floodwaters, with parked cars navigating through water nearly as high as their tires. The deluge left the city grappling with the aftermath of the unexpected inundation.

item.media:title: Xativa train station submerged: torrential rainfall transforms streets into rivers
item.media:description: Xativa, Spain - On September 13, 2023, torrential rainfall transformed Xativa's train station and streets into a waterlogged landscape. In a video captured by @alventosa81, floodwaters at the train station reached tire-high levels, with a car struggling to navigate through the deluge. The streets resembled flowing rivers as the region grappled with the aftermath of the massive rainfall.

item.media:title: Emergency landing in Novosibirsk: Ural Airlines flight safely evacuated
item.media:description: On September 12, 2023, a Ural Airlines plane en route from Sochi to Omsk made an emergency landing in the Novosibirsk region in Russia, specifically in the Ubinsk area. The aircraft, carrying 167 passengers, touched down on a grass field. The cause of the incident was a lack of fuel, which occurred as a result of a change in landing airport due to a failure of the hydraulic system on the plane. Fortunately, there were no casualties, and all passengers were safely evacuated. They have since been transported to Omsk via train.

item.media:title: Ussuriysk flood brawl: two residents fight for unknown reasons in floodwaters
item.media:description: On August 13, 2023, in the flood-stricken city of Ussuriysk, Russia, an unusual and potentially life-threatening altercation unfolded amidst the rising waters. Eyewitnesses captured a shocking scene as two local residents, standing chest-deep in the floodwaters, escalated their dispute into a physical confrontation. The exact cause of their disagreement remains a mystery, but they chose to settle their differences in front of a captive audience. Fortunately, one quick-thinking spectator intervened before matters could worsen, preventing a potential tragedy as one of the men came perilously close to drowning the other.

item.media:title: A glimpse of desperation: terrible living conditions inside Marinka's war-torn basements
item.media:description: In a gripping video captured by @dimka_dmitrivich on August 5, 2023, in Marinka, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine, an elderly lady bravely reveals the dire living conditions endured by locals in the midst of the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine. The footage paints a stark picture of life in the basement, where battered shelves, a weathered dinner table, a meager water tank, and a few other items are all residents have to make do with. @dimka_dmitrivich is among the unsung heroes tirelessly working to help evacuate and support people trapped in these war-torn areas, shedding light on the harsh realities they face daily.

item.media:title: Intense training: Ukrainian soldiers prepare for battle in West Ukraine
item.media:description: In a video captured on September 9, 2023, in West Ukraine by @_sekret11, Ukrainian soldiers were depicted undergoing rigorous training to prepare for the battlefield. The footage showcases soldiers emerging from underground trenches and facing various challenges under the direction of their instructor, whose voice can be heard in the background. This intense training regimen underscores the dedication and commitment of Ukrainian troops as they ready themselves for the demanding realities of warfare.

item.media:title: Unleashed shepherd takes the wheel: dog holds bus hostage in Rostov's Staraya Stanitsa
item.media:description: On the morning of September 9, 2023, in the village of Staraya Stanitsa near Kamensk in Russia's Rostov region, an unusual incident unfolded that left locals both bewildered and amused. A bold dog, resembling a shepherd, commandeered a passenger bus near the Charm store, prompting the driver and all passengers to evacuate. Although the canine intruder didn't exhibit direct aggression, it firmly maintained control over the vehicle, resisting attempts to coax it out with sausages. Local rescuer Evgeny Filippenkov came to the rescue, donning protective gear, armed with a stick and rope, and successfully led the determined dog out of the bus. Presently, the dog awaits its owner's return at a nearby watermelon point of sale, serving as a peculiar reminder of a remarkable day in Staraya Stanitsa.

item.media:title: Vandal shatters princess Turandot sculpture in Arbat, Moscow
item.media:description: In a shocking act of vandalism, an unknown man wreaked havoc on the historic Princess Turandot sculpture, located in front of the Vakhtangov Theater in the heart of Moscow's Arbat district in Russia. The incident, which took place on September 9, 2023, was captured on video and has left both art enthusiasts and theatergoers stunned. The iconic fountain-monument, erected in 1997 to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the first production of the eponymous play, has deep roots in the theater's rich history, dating back to the premiere of "The Miracle of St. Anthony" in 1921. As the man climbed atop the statue, his reckless actions led to the sculpture's dramatic shattering, sending him tumbling down in a startling descent, marking a tragic chapter in the theater's legacy. The man was taken to Botkin Hospital with fractures and a head injury.

item.media:title: Brave Volzhsky residents foil robbery attempt, subdue intoxicated attacker
item.media:description: In the city of Volzhsky, located in the Volgograd Region of Russia, a small grocery store turned into the scene of a courageous act on September 4, 2023. When an unknown assailant attempted to rob the store and harass its saleswoman, two fearless Volga residents swiftly intervened. In a dramatic scuffle caught on CCTV cameras provided by the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the Volgograd Region, these local heroes confronted the criminal. Although one of them was knocked down by a single powerful blow, they managed to subdue the intoxicated attacker along with the help of a third man. The brave actions of these citizens led to the apprehension of the 33-year-old local resident, who had a previous criminal record. A criminal case has been initiated under the charge of "Robbery," highlighting the unwavering spirit of Volzhsky's community in protecting their own.

item.media:title: Violent fight erupts at Moscow metro station: stowaway assaults fellow passenger
item.media:description: In a shocking incident at Moscow's Narodnoye Opolchenie metro station on August 10, 2023, a 24-year-old unemployed man launched an unprovoked attack on a fellow passenger, resulting in his detention by metro officers. The assailant had reportedly followed the victim through the turnstile and received a reprimand for his actions. In response, he unleashed a barrage of punches, beating the passenger before they were separated by a courageous bystander. The head of the press service for the capital's prosecutor's office, Lyudmila Nefedova, confirmed that the attacker's actions are classified under the article "Beatings," and emphasized that bringing him to criminal responsibility is now under the jurisdiction of the prosecutor's office of the Moscow Metro

item.media:title: Terrifying moments: panic grips Marrakesh as deadly 6.8 magnitude earthquake strikes
item.media:description: In the wake of a devastating 6.8 magnitude earthquake that struck Marrakesh, Morocco on September 9, 2023, chaos and panic gripped the city's residents. The video captured by @wmpoelenburg depicts the sheer terror that enveloped the town as people rushed through its streets seeking safety. Sirens wailed in the distance as the quake's destructive force took its toll, resulting in the tragic loss of at least over 1000 lives and leaving more than 1,200 injured. The ancient structures that had long adorned the city's landscape were not spared, further compounding the anguish of its inhabitants.

item.media:title: Devastating 6.8-magnitude earthquake strikes Morocco, leaving over 1,000 dead
item.media:description: In a heart-wrenching scene captured by @le1e2eo on September 9, 2023, in Jemaa el-Fnaa, Morocco, a powerful 6.8-magnitude earthquake jolted the region, plunging the night into chaos and fear. As the tremors struck, catching many in their beds, people were compelled to evacuate their homes in sheer panic. The haunting video depicts a nightmarish tableau of sirens wailing, with individuals scrambling outdoors and navigating through narrow corridors littered with building debris. Just 19 minutes later, a 4.9-magnitude aftershock exacerbated the already dire situation. State media reports now indicate a grim toll, with over 1,000 casualties, primarily in Marrakesh, located approximately 44 miles from the earthquake's epicenter. The precise scale of the tragedy remains uncertain as rescue operations intensify.

item.media:title: Terrifying 6.2 magnitude earthquake strikes La Serena
item.media:description: On the evening of September 6, 2023, at approximately 20:48 local time, a medium-intensity earthquake with a magnitude of 6.2 rattled the coastal city of La Serena, Chile. The unsettling event was captured in a video by @AmpueroOsvaldo, who happened to be at Insumos Isla Negra at the time. The footage showed the immediate impact of the quake as objects inside a house trembled and some boxes tumbled to the floor. There were no reported injuries.

item.media:title: Climate Protesters evicted from Arthur Ashe Stadium after halting U.S. open women's semi-final
item.media:description: In a dramatic turn of events at the U.S. Open women's semi-final held at Arthur Ashe Stadium in New York City on September 7, 2023, climate protesters brought the tennis match between American Coco Gauff and Czech Karolina Muchova to a standstill for nearly an hour. The demonstrators, rallying against fossil fuel use, managed to infiltrate the stadium and stage a protest, causing a significant delay in the highly anticipated match. However, their disruption was short-lived as security swiftly removed the protesters from the venue, allowing the game to finally resume.

item.media:title: Climate change protestors disrupt US open semifinal, delay match for 49 minutes
item.media:description: September 8, 2023, in New York City's Arthur Ashe Stadium, a U.S. Open Tennis Championships semifinal match between Coco Gauff and Karolina Muchova was momentarily brought to a halt as four environmental protesters took center stage in the upper levels of the stadium. Captured by @troyheibein, the protesters' demonstration called for an end to fossil fuels, with chants reverberating through the crowd. The disruption caused a 49-minute delay in the match.
item.media:keywords: climate change,protest,US Open,disruption,demonstrators,fossil fuels,New York City,environment,Arthur Ashe Stadium,delay,tennis,activists,Coco Gauff,Karolina Muchova,crowd,urgency,@troyheibein,demonstration,spectators,concerns

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers boost morale on front line through song and dance amidst Donetsk shelling
item.media:description: In the midst of the ongoing conflict in Donetsk, Ukraine, two Ukrainian soldiers found a unique way to boost their spirits and those of their comrades. A video captured by @soldat2001_23 on September 1, 2023, showcases the soldiers singing and dancing joyfully to a song amidst the backdrop of shelling in the Donetsk region. In his words, the author shared, "about this event, I can only say that it was on the front line after shelling in the Donetsk region, in order to support the fighting spirit, we raised our spirits a little and the mood of those around us and those who watch me."

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers of the 135th battalion cooking for comrades in Bakhmut amidst conflict
item.media:description: In a heartfelt display of camaraderie amidst the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine, Ukrainian soldiers from the 135th Battalion, part of the OB TRO of the 114th Brigade, were captured in a touching video preparing a meal for their fellow comrades in the war-torn city of Bakhmut, Ukraine. The footage, shared by @ags_mario on April 30, 2023, showcased a scene of resilience and unity as these brave soldiers gathered around a gas stove with a large pot of food simmering, while others diligently worked on preparing various components of the meal.

item.media:title: Torrential deluge transforms Toledo streets into rivers
item.media:description: On September 3, 2023, Toledo, Spain, experienced severe flooding as captured in a video by @educarbajal07. The town's streets were transformed into raging rivers as heavy rainfall caused by an Isolated Depression at High Levels (DANA) wreaked havoc. This weather event led to traffic disruptions and widespread flooding in Toledo, leaving the town grappling with the aftermath of nature's fury.

item.media:title: Terrifying shelling strikes residential area in Bakhmut, Ukraine, leaving several injured
item.media:description: On February 28, 2023, in the city of Bakhmut, Ukraine, a harrowing incident unfolded as a video captured by @dimapanda9111 documented a distressing scene. In the footage, Russian shelling can be seen targeting residential buildings, with one structure already engulfed in flames. The footage abruptly shifts to chaos as a deafening explosion rocks the area, prompting @dimapanda9111 to flee to safety, urgently calling out to others. Sadly, this shelling incident resulted in several people sustaining injuries.

item.media:title: Son of Central African Republic's president sparks controversy in Kislovodsk: violent outburst leaves two Russians injured"
item.media:description: In Kislovodsk, Russia, Evariste Touadera, the son of the President of the Central African Republic (CAR), stirred up a major commotion when he assaulted a man and a woman on August 28, 2023. Evariste had arrived in Russia a few weeks prior for what was supposed to be a rehabilitation program, accompanied by a delegation and professional therapists. However, on August 28, he vanished just before his scheduled flight to Moscow, only to be found at Kislovodsk station, where he launched a violent attack on his escorts, resulting in injuries to two Russians. The incident, caught on camera, depicts Evariste Touadera's aggressive outburst towards two individuals, a male and a female.

item.media:title: Volunteers jamming with Ukrainian soldiers: support for the 93rd OMBR near Bakhmut
item.media:description: In a heartwarming display of solidarity, a group of volunteers joined Ukrainian soldiers from the 93rd OMBR near Bakhmut in a musical gathering captured by @l.a.r.a.a.n.g.e.l on September 1, 2023. As the Ukraine-Russia conflict persists, these dedicated individuals came together to boost the morale of the soldiers, strumming guitars and singing in unity.

item.media:title: Explosion rocks Pushkinskaya street near southern military district headquarters in Rostov-on-Don
item.media:description: In the early hours of September 7, 2023, Rostov-on-Don was jolted awake by a series of deafening explosions that sent shockwaves through the city. Startled residents in the city center and Bataysk were among the first to report the unsettling sounds, prompting immediate concerns about their origin. Soon after, a video surfaced, capturing a fiery explosion on Pushkinskaya Street, merely two blocks away from the Southern Military District headquarters. However, the cause of the blasts was soon revealed to be the result of air defense forces successfully intercepting and shooting down two menacing drones that had breached the city's airspace. The incident resulted in only one reported injury, underscoring the city's unwavering commitment to ensuring its safety and security.

item.media:title: Terrifying moments: dinner table shakes as 6.2 magnitude earthquake strikes La Serena, Chile
item.media:description: On September 6, 2023, at 8:48 p.m. local time in La Serena, Chile, an unsettling event unfolded as captured in a video by @eldia_ccorrea. While seated at the dinner table, residents experienced the alarming tremors of a magnitude 6.2 earthquake. The footage reveals household items shaking as the quake rattled the area. The epicenter of the earthquake was located 41 kilometers (25 miles) south-southwest of Coquimbo, Chile, at a depth of 41 kilometers.

item.media:title: Tragedy strikes Konstantinovka: Russian shelling claims 17 lives, including child
item.media:description: On September 6, 2023, a devastating tragedy unfolded in Konstantinovka, Ukraine, as 17 innocent lives, including that of a child, were abruptly cut short by a brutal shelling incident at the central market. Another 20 people were injured - Ukrainian Prime Minister Shmygal said. Ukrainian authorities have attributed the attack to Russian troops, which has heightened tensions in the region. The market, bustling with people going about their daily business, was suddenly engulfed in chaos and fire as the shelling struck, forcing terrified individuals to scramble for safety. As the scene remains cordoned off by law enforcement, a search and rescue operation is underway to tend to the wounded and assess the extent of the damage caused by this heartbreaking event.

item.media:title: Floodwaters surge through Skiathos, Greece, as torrential rainfall hits
item.media:description: Skiathos, a picturesque island in the Sporades, Greece, recently bore witness to a dramatic deluge as torrential rainfall inundated the town streets. A video captured by @Pashalis Manolis on September 5, 2023, revealed the startling sight of floodwaters sweeping a blue waste bin downstream while a brave car attempted to navigate the inundated roads. The island experienced an extraordinary amount of rainfall, with some areas receiving an entire year's worth of precipitation in just one day. However, there's good news amidst the chaos; as reported by @Pashalis Manolis, the floodwaters have now receded, and Skiathos is safe and prepared to welcome tourists once more. This comes as storm Daniel has hit the area leaving a trail of damages and floods.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldier finds a comb: a comrade's keepsake for his mustache
item.media:description: In a touching moment captured on August 19, 2023, in the Robotino district of the Zaporizhzhia region, Ukraine, a Ukrainian soldier's simple act of grooming his beard became a poignant testament to camaraderie on the frontlines. The video, shared by @__.__dreamer__.__ , shows the soldier meticulously combing his beard with a small black comb. The soldier cleans the comb of dirt and continues to groom his facial hair. The author shares a heartfelt sentiment saying, "but this is where my friend is sitting. He found the comb and decided to keep it and take care of his mustache."

item.media:title: Shocking hit-and-run incident: police officer attacked by fleeing van
item.media:description: In a startling incident that unfolded on the evening of September 3, 2023, in the Kovrovsky district of Russia, a shocking video capturing the moment of a brazen attack on a police officer has emerged on social media. The footage reveals a blue van forcefully ramming into a police officer who was standing near a patrol car, before speeding away from the scene. The Kovrov police have declined to provide any immediate comments on the audacious crime. However, the Investigative Committee for the Vladimir region swiftly initiated a criminal case for the use of violence dangerous to life or health against a government official. The alleged driver of the GAZelle involved in the incident is reported to be a 39-year-old Kovrov resident, and an intensive investigation is currently underway to apprehend the perpetrator and bring them to justice.

item.media:title: Portable charger explosion prompts evacuation at St. Petersburg school on Vasilyevsky Island
item.media:description: In a startling incident at a school on Vasilyevsky Island in St. Petersburg, Russia, on September 6, 2023, a portable charger exploded inside a student's backpack, triggering the evacuation of students and staff. The incident occurred in the 4th building of the gymnasium located on Morskaya Embankment. Video footage from the scene captured smoke billowing from the backpack, which had been placed on the corridor floor. Fortunately, no injuries were reported, and emergency responders swiftly ensured the safety of all individuals involved. Investigations into the cause of the charger explosion are currently underway, as both school officials and local authorities work to prevent any such incidents from occurring in the future.

item.media:title: Topless protestors challenge 'Italian rape culture' at Venice Film Festival
item.media:description: Topless protestors made a bold statement at the Venice Film Festival on September 4, 2023, as they stood in a line, chanting slogans against "Italian Rape Culture." The protesters, both male and female, captured in a video by @whitlockandpope, walked past Woody Allen's red carpet event. Their powerful demonstration aimed to draw attention to the issue. After their slogans were chanted, the protestors put their tops back on, leaving a lasting impression on the festival's attendees.

item.media:title: Hope in motion: the woman enjoys a roundabout spin at the new 'school of indomitability' Ukraine
item.media:description: In the midst of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a glimmer of hope emerges from the heart of Donetsk Oblast. @alinachubuk222, on August 31, 2023, captured a poignant video depicting her swinging on a school swing in the town of Lyman, Ukraine. This swing was not just any playground equipment; it symbolized a resilient spirit determined to provide education for children in the midst of adversity. Known as the "School of Indomitability," this educational initiative was forged in collaboration with the Mayor of Lyman, aiming to offer young minds a chance to continue learning despite the grim circumstances.

item.media:title: Violent confrontation erupts as Russian police clash with illegal jade miners in Buryatia
item.media:description: In a dramatic turn of events in a video footage that surfaced on September 3, 2023, law enforcement authorities in the Okinsky district of Buryatia, Russia, found themselves in a harrowing showdown with a group of illegal jade miners. The confrontation, captured on video and later published by a local publication, depicts police officers negotiating with the armed criminals, urging them to surrender their weapons. However, the situation escalated rapidly, with the miners vigorously resisting arrest, hurling stones, and exchanging gunfire with the police. This intense encounter marked the second attempt by the authorities to apprehend these jade miners, resulting in the detention of 30 individuals, the seizure of 80 kg of illicitly extracted jade, and the confiscation of eight quad bikes. Five of the most combative miners have been arrested and are now facing criminal charges for their violent actions against law enforcement officers.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldier's high-tech surveillance: using drones to track Russian positions
item.media:description: In a tense escalation of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a video captured by @k_a_m_y_s_h_60 on June 17, 2023, in Bakhmut, Ukraine, has surfaced, showcasing a Ukrainian soldier employing cutting-edge technology. The footage reveals the soldier skillfully utilizing a drone's control panel to pinpoint Russian positions in real-time. In the video, the soldier can be seen zooming in and out as he searches for the enemy.

item.media:title: Children's art and courage: Ukrainian soldiers showcase children's' solidarity drawings
item.media:description: In a touching display of resilience, a video footage recorded by @skif1986 on September 2, 2023, showcased Ukrainian soldiers in the Donetsk region in Ukraine, proudly holding up drawings made by children from Ukraine as they faced the ongoing conflict with Russia. The drawings, delivered to the soldiers by the volunteer group Volunteers of Transcarpathia, served as a symbol of hope and support amid the challenging circumstances.

item.media:title: Ukraine soldiers bond over dumpling cooking break amidst rotation in Donetsk Region
item.media:description: In the heart of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a brief respite from the tension emerged as Ukrainian soldiers in the Donetsk region of Ukraine gathered to cook a communal meal. Captured in a video by @zuzulka_ua on August 31, 2023, the soldiers could be seen preparing dumplings on a gas cylinder. The soldiers had taken a two-hour break from their positions to purchase the ingredients, with some of their comrades returning from their duties. One soldier jokingly shared that his brother had poured a whopping three kilos of dumplings into the pot.

item.media:title: War-torn Bakhmut: a glimpse into the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine
item.media:description: On August 14, 2023, in the war-ravaged city of Bakhmut, Ukraine, a grim testament to the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine was captured in a haunting video by @privid_bahmyta. The footage depicted a scene of utter devastation, with partially demolished buildings and billowing smoke shrouding the area. One of the structures bore the scars of battle, its top floors reduced to rubble, while another was charred black, presumably from a fire. As the camera panned across the destruction, the distant sound of gunfire punctuated the eerie silence.

item.media:title: Ukrainian forces find respite amidst conflict by having a drink in makeshift plastic bottle cups
item.media:description: In the midst of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a poignant video captured by @kirilllebedka5 on August 25, 2022, sheds light on the resilience and humanity of Ukrainian forces stationed in the frontlines. The footage, set in Zaitseve village, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine, reveals a brief moment of respite as these soldiers take a break in the forest. In a touching display of resourcefulness, they employ plastic bottles, ingeniously cut to serve as makeshift cups, to enjoy a well-deserved drink.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers navigate through abandoned war-torn homes in Bakhmut
item.media:description: In a poignant video captured on July 27, 2022, in Bakhmut, Ukraine, Oleksandr Gromak, a Ukrainian soldier with the social media handle @OleksandrGromak showcased the grim reality of Ukrainian soldiers navigating through abandoned and war-damaged homes. Gromak said that, "It was only the beginning of the war, but we continued to defend our positions, even though sometimes there was nothing."

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers brave constant fire in Novomykhailivka: the 66th brigade's gritty underground exchange
item.media:description: In a gripping video captured by @koshkarov_yarik on June 14, 2022, in Novomykhailivka, Ukraine, the unwavering determination of Ukrainian soldiers in the face of relentless adversity comes to light. In the video, soldiers can be seen seated while others standing in an underground area. The author says "the 66th brigade exchanged 54 of us under constant fire". This comes when there is an active conflict between Russia and Ukraine.

item.media:title: Ukrainian tanker enroute to Zaporizhzhia amidst conflict with Russia
item.media:description: On August 26, 2023, in the midst of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a Ukrainian soldier, identified as @aleksandr_su_p_ru_n, captured a harrowing video. The footage shows a soldier driving a tanker with his companions on a road enroute to the Zaporizhzhia region in Ukraine for a mission.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers learn covert mine planting amidst Russia-Ukraine conflict
item.media:description: In a recent video captured by @dmitriykirishun on May 13, 2023, in the Kyiv region of Ukraine, Ukrainian soldiers were seen undergoing training in the clandestine art of mine planting. The footage reveals soldiers meticulously concealing a planted mine beneath a layer of earth and grass, rendering it virtually invisible. This training session was conducted by a group of dedicated volunteers and takes place in the midst of escalating tensions between Russia and Ukraine.

item.media:title: Embracing the unexpected: walking through the mud at Burning Man 2023
item.media:description: Amidst the unexpected turn of events at the Burning Man festival in Black Rock Desert, Nevada, USA, attendees found themselves navigating a transformed landscape. Following heavy rainfall, what was once a dusty desert turned into a muddy quagmire, stranding over 70,000 festival-goers and their vehicles. One intrepid attendee, @bp22 captured a video on September 4, 2023, embracing the muddy adventure, walking through the mud with friends. With a playful spirit, he reassured his companions that getting a little dirty was okay as long as they do not fall. While some sought ways to escape the mire, others chose to go with the flow, illustrating the diverse reactions to this unexpected twist in the annual festival's storyline.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers march through desolate Bakhmut
item.media:description: In the haunting aftermath of conflict, Ukrainian soldier @diman15688 captured a chilling glimpse of Bakhmut, Ukraine, on January 13, 2023. The once-thriving city now lay eerily deserted, its streets overgrown with foliage, and many buildings bearing the scars of destruction. Bakhmut has become a major battleground in the ongoing Ukraine-Russia conflict, and the Ukrainian soldiers seen in the video were on their way back from a challenging combat mission.

item.media:title: Berliners take to the streets for climate: raving against A100 motorway extension
item.media:description: On September 2, 2023, Berliners made a bold statement in favor of climate action, choosing music and dance as their tools of protest. Thousands of clubbers, climate activists, and local residents gathered in the Friedrichshain district of eastern Berlin in Germany to block a kilometer-long stretch of a main road. With the blessing of Berlin authorities, local nightclubs transformed the roadway into an impromptu outdoor dancefloor, complete with smoke machines, glitter balls, and drinks stands. A @bikeberlin13 captured a video showing people demonstrating out of a certain building. Their message was clear: they aimed to prevent the extension of the A100 motorway, which threatened to cut through this vibrant urban neighborhood and destroy some of Berlin's most beloved nightclubs. In this unique demonstration, the people of Berlin showcased their dedication to preserving their city's cultural and environmental heritage.

item.media:title: Courageous defense: Ukrainian soldiers hold the line in Bakhmut's Khromove settlement
item.media:description: In the midst of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a gripping video captured by @lid_skhid on March 8, 2023, offers a raw and unfiltered glimpse into the Ukrainian frontline. The footage unfolds in the trenches on the outskirts of Bakhmut, specifically in the settlement of Khromove. Ukrainian troops, alongside GUR policemen, valiantly hold their ground, defending against Russian assaults. Their mission, as described by @lid_skhid, involves navigating treacherous terrain, trudging through muddy fields for a grueling 3 kilometers, occupying strategic positions, and steadfastly repelling enemy advances.

item.media:title: Heroic rescue efforts amidst phosphorus mines: saving 'Malysh' the dog in Chasiv Yar, Ukraine
item.media:description: In Chasiv Yar, Donetsk region, Ukraine, a heartwarming rescue mission unfolded as a group of individuals attempted to evacuate a dog named "Malysh" from an abandoned homestead. The video was captured by @ludenskyi on April 1, 2023. As they settled outside with the canine, a series of white objects began falling from the sky, later identified as phosphorous mines. Thankfully, the dog was safely hidden in a cage. However later, as they approached a tow car, an illuminating mine landed perilously close. With quick thinking and a stroke of luck, the mine detonated in mid-air, sparing the car from destruction. The rescue team proceeded to reposition the vehicle and successfully retrieved the dog, but not without witnessing several more mine landings nearby, causing small fires.

item.media:title: Volunteers from the White Tserkva working in Bakhmut help Ukrainian soldiers to launch a new drone
item.media:description: Volunteers from the White Tserkva in Bakhmut, Ukraine, came together to support their country's soldiers during the ongoing conflict with Russia. On June 10, 2023, a video captured by @dmitriykirishun showcased the dedicated efforts of these volunteers as they assisted Ukrainian soldiers in launching a new drone.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers retaliate with AKs and RPG7s in conflict zone
item.media:description: In a harrowing video captured by @oleksandr081290 on February 27, 2022, in Bakhmut, Ukraine, Ukrainian soldiers were seen valiantly defending an abandoned neighborhood amidst the ongoing conflict with Russia. With the sound of gunfire ringing through the air, these brave soldiers, armed only with AK assault rifles and RPG-7 rocket launchers, stood their ground against the advancing enemy forces. Their determination was evident as one of them said, "We stood at 0 and saw that the gangs were climbing, it must be stopped at any cost."

item.media:title: Projectile launch bought with a donation from a girl from the Crimea
item.media:description: A video captured by @brsk_ea__elya, a Ukrainian soldier in Bakhmut, Ukraine, launched a single missile from a land-based missile launcher on February 28, 2023. According to the author, this projectile was bought with a donation from Elya from the Crimea.

item.media:title: Captured on camera: spectacular meteorite lights up Turkish sky
item.media:description: On the night of September 2, 2023, in Gümüşhane, Turkey, a remarkable celestial event unfolded as captured by @Habip785's dashcam. While driving along the Erzincan road, a dazzling meteorite streaked across the sky, illuminating the darkness with its brilliant light. The video footage showcases the car's journey on the winding road, with the meteorite's breathtaking passage stealing the spotlight as it blazed a trail across the heavens. This captivating celestial display was not confined to a single observer; people from various parts of the country reported witnessing the meteorite's spectacular light show,

item.media:title: Floods strikes Serramar, Alcanar, Spain: waist-high waters inundate homes
item.media:description: In a harrowing scene from Serramar, Alcanar, Spain, captured by @enjolrmus on September 3, 2023, a video reveals the extent of a devastating flood that has besieged the tranquil urbanization. The footage showcases waist-high waters inundating both the interior of a home and its surrounding yard. With homes and property submerged beneath the rising waters, residents of Serramar find themselves grappling with the grim reality of a natural disaster that has left their community submerged. The flooding has been caused by torrential rains that has hit the area.

item.media:title: A landslide covers a medieval monastery near Mtskheta in Georgia
item.media:description: On August 27, 2023, near the town of Mtskheta, Georgia, an astonishing event unfolded as eyewitnesses captured a harrowing video of a massive chunk of land breaking away from the hillside and tumbling down towards the ancient Shiomgvime Monastery. The Shio-Mgvime Monastery, nestled in a narrow limestone canyon along the northern bank of the Kura River, approximately 30 kilometers from Georgia's capital, Tbilisi, witnessed a dramatic spectacle. As the land detached, a colossal cloud of dust billowed into the air, shrouding the surroundings. Swift and coordinated efforts led to the safe evacuation of the area, thankfully preventing any casualties.

item.media:title: Heroes of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers defend against Wagnerites amidst devastation
item.media:description: In the war-torn city of Bakhmut, Ukraine, on March 23, 2023, a harrowing video captured the courageous efforts of Ukrainian soldiers as they sprinted towards their military vehicles against a backdrop of wreckage and destruction. The soldiers, led by @ferbootboom, were resolute in their determination to defend their homeland against constant assaults by Wagnerite forces, who had suffered significant losses in their relentless attacks.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers lighten the mood: behind-the-scenes humor in Bakhmut
item.media:description: On August 31, 2023, in the city of Bakhmut, Ukraine, a video captured by @rocket_brutto_ showcased a lighthearted moment among Ukrainian soldiers. In the video, one soldier can be seen adjusting his army uniform before playfully running away and hiding behind the bushes. These soldiers are part of the mortar crew.

item.media:title: Volat battalion soldiers find joy amidst conflict in Bakhmut
item.media:description: Amidst the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine, a video captured by @rocket_brutto_ on August 21, 2023, in Bakhmut, Ukraine, offers a glimpse into the lives of soldiers from the Volat battalion of the Kalinovsky regiment. In the footage, members of the mortar crew can be seen taking a moment of respite to unwind and find moments of joy. One soldier lies on the floor, dancing with an air of carefree abandon, while another soldier chuckles as he looks at his phone.

item.media:title: Footage from the frontlines: prisoners captured and transferred amidst ongoing conflict in Bakhmut, Ukraine
item.media:description: Amidst the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine, a Ukrainian soldier with the username @Slepokura96 captured a significant video on July 9, 2023, near Bakhmut, Ukraine. The footage depicts a crucial moment during one of the battles where Ukrainian forces managed to capture prisoners. In the video, the captured soldiers can be seen lying on the grass, subdued by their captors. The Ukrainian soldiers then proceed to transfer the prisoners, their documents confiscated, underscoring the intensifying situation in the region.

item.media:title: Medieval monastery in Georgia's Mtskheta threatened as rock collapses on its territory
item.media:description: A significant incident unfolded on August 27, 2023, as a rock collapse sent shockwaves through the serene surroundings of the medieval Shio-Mgvime Monastery in Mtskheta, Georgia. This historic monastic architectural complex, nestled within a narrow limestone gorge along the Mtkvari River, faced an unforeseen landslide, prompting visitors to hastily evacuate the premises. Fortunately, initial reports indicated no immediate casualties, allowing the focus to shift towards search and rescue efforts. The dramatic event was captured on video, revealing a massive cloud of dust that billowed into the air, shrouding the entire gorge in a veil of particles. The monastery, located approximately 30 km from the capital city of Tbilisi, now stands as a testament to the unpredictability of nature's force and the resilience of human heritage.

item.media:title: Rostov blogger survives near-fatal fall after roof to roof car stunt goes wrong
item.media:description: Rostov-on-Don, Russia - August 29, 2023 - Blogger Evgeny Chebotarev was hospitalized after falling from a roof while attempting a dangerous car stunt. @bednie.oligarhi and @chebotarev_life were filming a video in which @chebotarev_life would drive a Niva car from one roof to another. However, the stunt went wrong and the car crashed into the side of the building, causing Chebotarev to fall from the roof. The car was badly damaged, but Chebotarev survived with only minor injuries. He was taken to the hospital and released a few hours later.

item.media:title: Mysterious midnight meteor lights up the night sky in Angarsk: witness captures breathtaking video
item.media:description: On the night of August 29, 2023, residents of Angarsk, Irkutsk Oblast, Russia, were treated to a spectacular celestial event as a burning meteor streaked across the sky, captivating the attention of both local residents and social media users. Captured in a video by @Suri_na13, the meteor's descent was sudden and mesmerizing, casting an intense glow that illuminated the surroundings. The footage, taken from the 7th microdistrict, showcased the meteor's brilliant journey, leaving viewers in awe. While the video circulated widely and sparked discussions of a potential meteorite, it remains uncertain whether any fragments of the meteor reached the Earth's surface.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldier made a lighter from spare parts and a machine gun cartridge
item.media:description: In the aftermath of the ongoing Ukraine-Russia conflict, a poignant tale of resilience and creativity emerges from Kharkiv, Ukraine. August 17, 2023, marks a significant date in the journey of @rahowa_love, a Ukrainian soldier who has found solace and purpose in an unexpected craft. Having sustained injuries on the unforgiving frontlines, he turned to a unique form of self-expression – crafting lighters from military items. The self-made artisan, who has been perfecting his art for about two months now, recently captured a video of himself testing one of his handmade lighters.

item.media:title: Raging winds and rising waters: hurricane Idalia's ominous prelude in Sarasota, Florida
item.media:description: As Hurricane Idalia relentlessly advances towards Florida, USA, the state is already grappling with the harbingers of its impending fury. A video captured by @AJS9619 on August 30, 2023, reveals the ominous scene of flash flooding inundating roads and fierce winds gusting through Palm Avenue and Banana Court in downtown Sarasota. Despite the hurricane's full impact yet to be realized at the time, the footage paints a dire picture of the havoc it could unleash. Authorities have issued grave warnings about the storm surge, with the potential to elevate ocean waters up to a staggering 16 feet above ground level—a perilous situation that has already led to surges of up to six feet in some Florida towns. The urgency of the situation has prompted the evacuation of over 1.5 million residents across 28 counties, highlighting the catastrophic potential of this surging menace.

item.media:title: Night of glittering tracers: Pskov's startling encounter with drone attack amidst Ukraine-Russia conflict
item.media:description: On the night of August 30, 2023, the tranquil skies over Pskov, Russia were disrupted by a startling display of tracer bullets illuminating the darkness, followed by a series of explosions. Local residents were jolted from their routines as drones launched an attack on the city, with the target being the airport and joint airfield. Social media quickly lit up with video footage capturing the surreal scene, leaving concerned citizens to dial emergency numbers in search of answers. The Ministry of Emergency Situations worked to reassure the populace, attributing the disturbances to a fire that was under control. Yet, eyewitnesses' accounts of machine gun fire persisted even as the crimson glow gradually waned, underlining a more ominous reality. Mikhail Vedernikov, the region's governor, later revealed that the Ministry of Defense was actively repelling the drone assault. Preliminary reports indicated no casualties, although the incident unfolded against the backdrop of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, adding an unsettling layer to the already tense geopolitical landscape.

item.media:title: Night of glittering tracers: Pskov's drones attack amidst regional tensions
item.media:description: On the night of August 30, 2023, the tranquil city of Pskov, Russia was jolted by a startling incident as footage emerged showcasing tracer bullets illuminating the dark sky. The peaceful night was shattered by an unexpected drone attack, leaving local residents bewildered and concerned. The echoes of explosions resonated through the air, drawing people to their windows and out onto the streets, where a crimson glow enveloped the vicinity of the airport and joint airfield. Alarmed by the unsettling scene, residents swiftly dialed emergency numbers, prompting a response from the Ministry of Emergency Situations, which worked to reassure the populace by attributing the phenomenon to a controlled fire situation. However, eyewitness accounts painted a different picture, describing the persistent sounds of machine gun fire and the persistent glittering of tracer bullets overhead. The situation took a clearer turn when the regional governor, Mikhail Vedernikov, disclosed that the Ministry of Defense was actively repelling a drone attack, stemming from the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia. Initial reports indicated no casualties, but confirmed damage to four Il-76 aircraft, leading to the closure of regional airspace and roadblocks to the airport.

item.media:title: Drones attack Pskov: escalating tensions amidst Russia-Ukraine conflict
item.media:description: In a harrowing night for Pskov, Russia, on August 30, 2023, the city was shaken by a drone attack that targeted the airport and a joint airfield. The tranquility of the night was shattered by explosions and the eerie glow of fires engulfing the vicinity, leaving local residents alarmed and reaching out to emergency services. Amid the chaos, the sounds of machine gun fire echoed through the air, accompanied by the glimmer of tracer bullets across the night sky. Governor Mikhail Vedernikov reassured the public that the Ministry of Defense was actively repelling the drone assault, which marked the most significant of its kind in the region. While preliminary information indicated no casualties, four Il-76 aircraft sustained damage in the strike, prompting authorities to close the skies and block access roads.

item.media:title: Resilience amidst ruin: Kherson's liberation and the grandfather's rescue in the midst of conflict
item.media:description: In the aftermath of Kherson's liberation from Russian forces on November 11, 2022, a poignant scene unfolded near the Antonivsk bridge, Ukraine. Amidst the chaos of the conflict, captured in a video by volunteer @father_viktor, a grandfather found himself in a perilous situation as his house stood on the brink of destruction. With the village becoming a refuge for those fleeing the bombardment, the resounding echoes of artillery fire marked the devastating transformation of homes into rubble. In an act of humanity amidst the turmoil, the elderly man was rescued and ushered to safety, his ancestral abode succumbing to the relentless forces of war.

item.media:title: Ukrainian soldiers survive Kamikaze drone attack amidst escalating conflict in Bakhmut
item.media:description: In the midst of the escalating conflict between Russia and Ukraine, an unsettling incident occurred on August 28, 2023, near Bakhmut, Ukraine. A video captured by @cany5512 showcased Ukrainian soldiers of the 77th brigade from the DSHV as they were en route to change positions. Their routine drive took a dangerous turn when their vehicle was suddenly struck by a kamikaze FPV drone. The impact destroyed the windshield of the vehicle, leaving it visibly damaged. Fortunately, no casualties were reported among the soldiers, offering a silver lining to an otherwise harrowing event.

item.media:title: Ukrainian forces destroy Russian tank near Bakhmut in ongoing conflict
item.media:description: In a dramatic escalation of the year-long conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a video captured by @ololochechka on August 29, 2023, near Bakhmut in Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine, shows a harrowing scene as a Russian tank is obliterated by Ukrainian forces. The footage reveals a massive explosion engulfing the tanker as it is targeted and destroyed.

item.media:title: Ukrainian forces repel Russian advance: frontline footage tells the tale
item.media:description: In a gripping video captured by Ukrainian soldier @olegbond07 on August 20, 2023, near Klishchiivka, Ukraine, a pivotal moment in the ongoing conflict with Russia unfolds. The footage reveals a tense standoff as Ukrainian forces valiantly hold their ground against an advancing column of enemy equipment. Amid explosions triggered by concealed mines, the relentless infantry emerges, pushing forward towards Ukrainian positions. With unyielding determination, the defenders engage in a fierce firefight engaging with the unseen enemy.

item.media:title: Soldier's resilience: finding moments of self-care amidst conflict
item.media:description: In the midst of the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine, a poignant glimpse into the daily life of Ukrainian soldiers emerges from the village of Ivanivske in the Donetsk region, Ukraine. A video captured by @olk.hdmtrt on August 15, 2023, portrays a moment of unconventional camaraderie as a Ukrainian soldier washes her hair with the assistance of a fellow comrade, who carefully pours water n her hair from a cup. The soldier's words underscore the challenges they face - restricted movement in the combat zone, prolonged periods in fixed positions, and the lack of basic amenities.

item.media:title: Bear with can stuck on head roams near Primorye's Barabash village
item.media:description: In a concerning incident unfolding near the village of Barabash in Primorye, Russia, on August 29, 2023, local authorities and wildlife specialists are actively engaged in a search for a distressed bear. The bear, whose head is trapped within a container reminiscent of a can, has been sighted wandering in the vicinity of the village for the past week, prompting a collaborative effort to locate and assist the animal. The National Park "Land of the Leopard," situated nearby, has stepped in to offer support alongside Okhotnadzor and the Ministry of Forestry and Wildlife Protection of the Primorsky Territory. As the search intensifies for the bear in need, experts and local residents alike are hopeful for a swift and safe resolution to this urgent situation.

item.media:title: Chaos at Heathrow: massive queue and hundreds of flights cancelled due to air traffic control tech fault
item.media:description: Heathrow Airport's Terminal 5 witnessed scenes of chaos and frustration on August 28, 2023, as a massive queue stretched through the terminal following the cancellation of hundreds of flights due to a severe air traffic control system fault. Passengers, captured in a video by @Matthewpotts04, found themselves stranded amidst the disruption caused by the worst technical glitch in a decade. Airlines urged travelers to double-check their flight statuses before heading to the airport, as the fallout from the system fault continued to ripple through the travel plans of countless passengers.
